channel.title: Replace CustomCommands (adding Classes and arrays)

item.title: Replace CustomCommands (adding Classes and arrays)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. Try using coding conventions.
  2. Alot of that code is excessive.
  3. Dont call it a double array, unless the array type is the primitive double. Otherwise call it a two-dimensional array.
  4. Here, let me just show you:
public static String[][] sendMessage;
        static{
        sendMessage=new String[][] {
                sendMessage[12855]=new String[] {"You Convert to ancient magic.", "You convert to normal magic."},//****** THIS ******
                sendMessage[7311]=new String[] {"You are muted and You may not have the privlage to yell."},
                sendMessage[12855]=new String[] {"You Convert to ancient magic.", "You convert to normal magic."},//****** THIS ******
                sendMessage[12855]=new String[] {"You Convert to ancient magic.", "You convert to normal magic."},//****** THIS ******
                sendMessage[12855]=new String[] {"You Convert to ancient magic.", "You convert to normal magic."},//****** THIS ******
                sendMessage[12855]=new String[] {"You Convert to ancient magic.", "You convert to normal magic."},//****** THIS ******
                sendMessage[0]=new String[] {""}
        };
    }
/* Everything that has //****** THIS ****** commented is excessive and wastest time repeating the same exact thing multiple times.
  1. L2useCollections

Read full topic

item.title: Replace CustomCommands (adding Classes and arrays)
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:11, topic:240972”][quote author=Sonis link=topic=317290.msg2523152#msg2523152 date=1226026741]

Why is Czar so laggy anyways?

It doesn’t lagg until I get about 15-40 people on the server…
Most of the lagg comes form character saving and loading… >_>
You can only save and load so many files at the same time …
Also, it doesn’t even load anything that intense, it just loads the same worthless information over and over…
I was looking into mysql, and have only the information that gets updated to get updated…

Also, if i was into getting object saving like the .dat saving, then I would also have a better time and could do more accounts at the same time…
Also, make sure that you fix all the exceptions, i.e. changing the location for all the logs,
When you are loading the czar crap, there are so many exceptions from bad directories …
It tries to save things to drive c and drive c isn’t even formatted …

Oh and I was looking into making rendered tables for the Server Console.
I’m still deriding if I should use swing or the other one…

The best servers I’ve seen are the ones that doesn’t have shit on them… lolz
What I just said is a pun though…
[/quote]
Pac-man would clean your post up a lot, you use 3 periods quite a lot.
It lags because it is terribly designed, programmed and maintained.[/quote]
not his fault he bleeds from the vagina often
@topic: as stated before you are being original and trying kudos on that

Read full topic

item.title: Replace CustomCommands (adding Classes and arrays)
item.dc:creator: @Sonis Sonis
item.description:
@Sonis wrote:

I didn’t know what a hash map was 0.0 but I google searched it, And I think it might be better.
It’s almost the same as a list eh? the same thing that searches for new connections?

Would making an object list be better, or should I try doing the hash map?
Like If I was to use an object List, then I wouldn’t Need to have the Integer.ParseInt thingys in my code.
Keeping the sendMessage as an array would probably be best yes?

Also, I was looking into the hashmap examples on google, and It looks like ALOT of extra characters to add each thing,
I am thinking that I should map an array with a for loop statment to add to the hashmap?
kills the point but only needs to use the array once? Have it add the hashmap on startup just like the itemhandler etc etc etc???

This tutorial only took me 3hours to think and do and 40minutes to write and explain my working code.
So uhh after I get back from work in 11 hours, I am thinking mmm add another package and add a class for the hashmap?

I do Appreciate the replies.
thanks alot; have fun coding

Read full topic

item.title: Replace CustomCommands (adding Classes and arrays)

I was talking Hidendra about this not too long ago for up coming ideas for my server I’ll release.

I asked about switch statements, which was a horrible idea, but none the less he replied back about Hashmaps.
But don’t get me wrong, the way your doing is better then the current way, but if you want the best, use maps.
